item.title: About that Billboard Awards Prince tribute....
item.description: BET wins the "Shade of the Year Award" so far.
item.ExtractedText:
Facebook Twitter Instagram
About that Billboard Awards Prince tribute.... Updated 1733 GMT (0133 HKT) May 23, 2016 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Laverne Cox arrives for the 2016 Billboard Music Awards at on Sunday, May 22 in Las Vegas. Hide Caption 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Kesha 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Rihanna 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Ariana Grande 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Wiz Khalifa 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Britney Spears 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Z LaLa 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Heidi Klum 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Demi Lovato 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Nick Jonas 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Lindsey Vonn 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Sibley Scoles 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Meghan Trainor 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Nick Hissom 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Serayah McNeill 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Steven Tyler 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Lindsey Stirling 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Ciara 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Seal 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Tove Lo 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Trevor Moran 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Priyanka Chopra 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Shawn Mendes 24 photos: Billboard Music Awards 2016 red carpet Halsey (CNN) BET wins the "Shade of the Year Award" so far. The network took full advantage of the outcry against Madonna paying tribute to the late singer Sunday night during the Billboard Music Awards to do some marketing of its own. It tweeted a video featuring a photo of Prince and his symbol advertising the upcoming BET Awards on June 26 with the words "Yeah we saw that. Don't worry. We got you." Madonna's performance was targeted for criticism even before it happened. A Change.org petition gathered almost 9,000 signatures speaking out against the planned tribute. "We cannot let Madonna be the main and only artist tributing Prince during the 2016 Billboard Awards," the petition stated . "He is more than worthy of a better choice as a main performer." Read More The outcry moved Mark Bracco, executive producer of the Billboard Music Awards, to respond. "Listen, I think everybody is entitled to their opinion and everyone can have their own opinion, but I will say that we are honored and could not be more excited for Madonna to be on the show and to pay tribute to someone that was her friend and her peer and her colleague," Bracco said in an interview. Madonna's performance of Prince's hit "Nothing Compares 2 U" gave the naysayers further fodder. She was joined onstage by Stevie Wonder for the song and one person tweeted Monday that "Madonna sucked so bad last night." Madonna sucked so bad last night. I seriously had to change it...but couldnt find the remote. 😒😫😲😳 #PrinceTribute
